Propane is a vital resource needed to not only heat homes, but to ensure that #NDag producers are able to power their grain dryers & keep livestock warm. We’re pressing @FERC to provide increased access to propane to help minimize regional disruptions.

Joined my colleagues in supporting state primacy over energy regs & opposing proposals to ban hydraulic fracturing. #NDenergy produces nearly 1.5 million barrels of oil per day due to innovations like horizontal drilling & hydraulic fracturing, promoting our energy security.
